quizDescription: Test your expertise with advanced keyboard shortcuts for maximum computer efficiency.

questions.question: What keyboard shortcut is used to switch between open tabs in most web browsers?
questions.explanation: Ctrl + Tab allows you to cycle through open tabs within a web browser.

questions.question: Which keyboard shortcut is used to rename a selected file or folder in Windows Explorer/File Explorer?
questions.explanation: F2 activates the file/folder rename function in Windows Explorer/File Explorer.

questions.question: What keyboard shortcut is used to open the Run dialog in Windows?
questions.explanation: Win + R opens the Run dialog for running commands and applications.

questions.question: Which keyboard shortcut is used to quickly lock your computer in Windows?
questions.explanation: Win + L locks your computer and requires a password to unlock.

questions.question: What keyboard shortcut is used to force quit an application on macOS?
questions.explanation: Option + Command + Esc opens the Force Quit Applications dialog on macOS.
